formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: FV_{\text{contrib}} = \begin{cases} C \cdot \dfrac{(1+i)^{n}-1}{i}, & i \ne 0 \\ C \cdot n, & i = 0 \end{cases}
formulas.raw: FV_{\text{contrib}} = \begin{cases} C \cdot \dfrac{(1+i)^{n}-1}{i}, & i \ne 0 \\ C \cdot n, & i = 0 \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Future value of current savings \[ FV_{\text{savings}} = P_0 (1 + r_{\text{pre}})^{T} \] Future value of monthly contributions (with employer match) \[ FV_{\text{contrib}} = \begin{cases} C \cdot \dfrac{(1+i)^{n}-1}{i}, & i \ne 0 \\ C \cdot n, & i = 0 \end{cases} \] where \(C\) is total monthly contribution and \(i\) the monthly return. Sustainable real withdrawal (monthly) over \(N\) months \[ W = \begin{cases} \dfrac{FV_{\text{real}} \cdot r_{\text{real}}}{1-(1+r_{\text{real}})^{-N}}, & r_{\text{real}} \ne 0 \\\\[6pt] \dfrac{FV_{\text{real}}}{N}, & r_{\text{real}} = 0 \end{cases} \]

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
